title.rendered: East Coast BioPharma Clusters Get Local Access to ClinLab Staffing

content.rendered:
Did you know ClinLab has offices in the 5 top biopharma clusters on the east coast?

ClinLab started serving the New England biotech community in 2002. Since then we’ve expanded into offices that cover much of the established east coast biotech clusters. Our bioscience/life science staffing services help clients manage their most critical staffing needs by connecting them with our large, industry specific talent pool in pharmaceutical, biotechnology, medical device, R&D and life sciences markets.

We work hard to be the best biotech clinical and scientific employment agency by providing exceptionally high levels of service to pharmaceutical and biotech clients and job seekers when and where they need it!

Within each biopharma cluster we have dedicated staffing resources on hand locally and can also tap into our networks in other regions for large group staffing placements or hard to fill positions.If you are a company or job seeker, contact us today at at ​​508.907.6222 and follow the prompts to connect with the appropriate regional office.

Boston/Cambridge, MA
Watertown, Massachusetts
480 Pleasant St. Suite C310, Watertown, MA 02472

New York / New Jersey
Newark, New Jersey
One Gateway Center, Suite 2600, Newark, NJ 07102

Greater Philadelphia
Philadelphia, Pennsylvania
2929 Arch St Suite 1700, Philadelphia, PA 19104

Raleigh-Durham, NC (includes Research Triangle Park, NC)
Raleigh, North Carolina
8801 Fast Park Drive Suite 301, Raleigh, NC 27617

BioHealth Capital Region (Maryland / Virginia / Washington, D.C.)
Gaithersburg, MD
9711 Washingtonian Boulevard Suite 550, Gaithersburg, MD 20878
